name: Snowdrop Escape
description: SDE is an authentic story modification which shows a part of the alternative universe of the Half-Life world and tells about the conflict between the rebels, the Combine and a third party for which you have to play. You are a mercenary named James. You are hired by an organization resisting both the rebels and the invaders. Your task is to resolve the conflict between the rebels and your employers by force without attracting the attention of the Combine.
